description: Creates a directory registration that authorizes communication between Amazon Web Services Private CA and an Active Directory.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Idempotency token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Active Directory.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Metadata assigned to a directory registration consisting of a key-value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: DirectoryRegistrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.
